review: Love it, and so easy to install.
author: Dorothy A. Vastola

review: Ok, for the price (thank you Prime day!) this thing is the bomb.  I can't quite give it 5 stars, but I'm glad I bought it.  Prime video works awesome.  Netflix does really well, but will have periods of low picture quality.  However, the MLB app runs like crap- it isn't even watchable.  But, like I said, for the price it's awesome to have the extra options.
author: Lyssa "Elisabeth"

review: Very easy to install. Quick set up. Very easy to use. Great product
author: joseph.gruss

review: Easy to install. Wish it had FIOS channels. I would recommend this product.
author: Michelle Gregory

review: I couldn't give it 5 stars because it didn't sync with my music playlists on my Kindle. Also, some of the genres were mixed up by having classical mixed in with country.
author: Marilynmltw "Marilynmltw"

review: Love this product! Now I have better access to Prime movies and TV that while I could access them from my PC I rarely did.  Have had the Fire TV stick a few weeks and now (for good or bad) I find myself binge watching some series and watching far more movies that previously.  Have found no issues with it so far - all works as expected.
author: Bruce Bartek "nolimitscoachva"

review: Great Item it does have a good wifi  and for its size it is a really fast.
author: Jose Luis Carmona Mendoza

review: Works better than Chrome Cast.Has more options,easier to opperate
author: JIM KUCHTA
